Description: Global nav: Rooms, LUMA, Search, Bag, State, SOS; consistent motion transitions; responsive patterns.

Schema-driven screens (Zod), branching/conditional/timed screens, accessibility baked in.

Generate/store receipts per session; minimal, privacy-safe payload; view in Momentum/Bag.

Audio mode with tempo/mood/intent controls; future-safe beat option.
Structured prompts + branching; summaries + receipts; escalation surfaces.
One-tap capture; optional prompts; voice notes become routing signals with consent.
Config defines screens, prompts, reflection points; supports Baseline Builds/Guided Exposures/Pattern Maps.
Experience→Reflect→Recognize→Reflect→Align→Reflect; feedback loop; wrap-up + receipt.

Audio playback with queue; resume/save (Bag); receipts.

Continuity curves, integrity logs, consent adherence, delivery reliability; proof via receipts.

Build content objects rendered as player screens; preview in runtime.
Create/edit/test/publish configs; versioning/rollback; cadence/consent/escalation guardrails.
Tables for users, sessions, cue interactions, receipts, bag items; RLS-first.

Edge functions for routing and webhooks (CRM/notifications).
